document.full_text: danilo gallinari scored 22 points, kenyon martin scored 6 of his 18 in the final 3:24, and the nuggets extended their winning streak to six.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: gallinari helps nuggets halt lakers' streak at 9
lines_and_colors: danilo gallinari scored 22 points, kenyon martin scored 6 of his 18 in the final 3:24, and the nuggets extended their winning streak to six.
